Insert rectal tube.sentence: The healthcare provider prepares the rectal tube and lubricant for the procedure.
Insert rectal tube.subject: The healthcare provider

Insert rectal tube.sentence: The patient assumes a comfortable position, typically lying on their side with knees drawn toward the chest.
Insert rectal tube.subject: The patient

Insert rectal tube.sentence: The healthcare provider gently inserts the lubricated rectal tube into the patient's rectum.
Insert rectal tube.subject: The healthcare provider

Insert rectal tube.sentence: The healthcare provider secures the rectal tube in place to prevent dislodgement.
Insert rectal tube.subject: The healthcare provider

Insert rectal tube.sentence: The healthcare provider monitors the patient for any signs of discomfort or complications during the procedure.
Insert rectal tube.subject: The healthcare provider
